die_area.note: DCiM accelerator with 128 input channels, 32 output channels, 2 weight sets

values.condition: peak at 400mV, 25°C with 25% input activity and 50% weight sparsity

zero_point_quantization.unsigned_to_signed_mapping: 20% power reduction and 17% area reduction vs naive 9b×9b approach
zero_point_quantization.booth_encoding: 28% reduction in compute power via radix-4 Booth encoding of stationary weights

memory_optimization.weight_storage: 20% reduction via high-density multibit latch (12T) with 95.5% insertion ratio
memory_optimization.double_buffering: allows concurrent weight update and compute with 32-cycle write window

comparison: Best-in-class area efficiency (TOPS/mm2) and energy efficiency (TOPS/W) among recent state-of-the-art digital CIM designs

key_features.synthesizable: fully synthesizable design using Intel 18A standard cell library
key_features.portability: enables technology node portability across foundries
